bibl.title: Hellenistic and Roman Pottery in the Eastern Mediterranean - Advances in Scientific Studies. Acts of the II Nieborów Pottery Workshop, Nieborów, 18-20 December 1993.
bibl.note: 27 papers on the pottery from Egypt, Cyprus and Syro-Palestine.

MEYZA Henryk and Jolanta MLYNARCZYK (Edd.), Hellenistic and Roman Pottery in the Eastern Mediterranean - Advances in Scientific Studies. Acts of the II Nieborów Pottery Workshop, Nieborów, 18-20 December 1993.
Warsaw, Polish Academy of Sciences, Research Centre for Mediterranean Archaeology, 1995, 4°, x-497 pp., nombr. figg., profils, cartes, pll. ISBN 83-901809-0-1.
